title: Claude@Stanford
description: Building and leading Anthropic's largest community of students building with Claude's suite of AI products.

title: DELTA
description: A periodical newsletter I created with one of my best friends as a canvas for our reviews of different tech products we're curious about.

title: Sunday High Table — SHiT
description: An intellectual community of thinkers from all walks of life who met every Sunday in Nairobi to discuss ideas ranging from the multiplicity of truth to the psychology of sexual kinks.

title: Kenga Media
description: Co-founded a digital and print publication covering Africa's Gen Z culture and insights and ran it for two years as publisher.

title: EarlyAdmit
description: Co-founded a coaching platform helping students from underrepresented minority backgrounds get into top grad programs.

title: Designish
description: A learning community for Africans and diasporans looking to build careers in UX: product design, content design, and user research.

title: PRiDE+
description: The student-run at the African Leadership University creating safe spaces for queer students and allies across both campuses.
